name: Ecover Dishwasher Tablets 25 Pack/500G
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Preparation_and_Usage>Usage: Remove large food scraps from dishes. Use only one tablet per wash cycle. Remove the wrapper and place in the dispenser. If the tablet does not fit the dispenser, place in the cutlery basket. Use with Ecover Rinse Aid for great results, remember to check the level regularly. Run the machine following the manufacturer's instruction. The following materials are not dishwasher-safe: silver, aluminium, brass, copper, crystal, antique or painted porcelain, plastic, wood, ivory and bone. These can all be washed by hand using Ecover Dishwashing Liquid..Remove the wrapper before use.</Preparation_and_Usage></Cooking_Instructions>
ingredients: Others: Sodium Citrate, Sodium Carbonate, Disodium Disilicate, Sodium Bicarbonate, Bleach Activator, Polypeptide, Sorbitol, Glycerin, Sodium Gluconate
PromotionDescription: £4 off when you spend £20 on selected Household products on Tesco.com
Messages: <Messages>      <Message TypeCode="BulkBuyLimit" TriggerQuantity="99" GroupId="NOT_MAPPED" Description="Sorry, there is a limit of 99 on this product">        <Stores all="true" />      </Message>    </Messages>
